page.title: 01KAREN AGED 9
page.content:
{. KAREN AGE 9
Karen lives in a modern house. Karen thinks where she lives is alright. Karen likes her school.{ Karen goes to school by car. It is nice for all ages where Karen lives. Her favourite T.V.progamme is East Enders. Karen has an assembly. Karen has lots of friends at school. Karen's teacher is called Mrs Wattson. Her favourite drink is lemonade. She thinks school is boring. She doesn't like sport. She likes playing out. { {MERYL AGE 8 Meryl gets up at 7.00am She walks to school it takes her 15 mins
